question_text: What is manifest XML in android?
option_a: A) It has information about layout in an application
option_b: B) It has all the information about an application
option_c: C) It has all the information about activities in an application
correct_answer: B) It has all the information about an application

question_text: What is the use of a content provider in Android?
option_a: A) For sharing the data between applications
option_b: B) For Storing the data in the database
option_c: C) For sending the data from one application to another
correct_answer: C) A content provider is used to share information between Android applications.
